Package lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Enemies

Class MonsterSlime

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Parents.Entity
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Parents.Monster
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Enemies.MonsterSlime
public class MonsterSlime extends Monster

MonsterSlime

The MonsterSlime class represents a slime monster in the CastleQuest game. It is a subclass of the Monster class and inherits its properties and behavior.
